steps.title: Configure Alien 4 Cloud
steps.content: Click here to setup users, clouds as well as monitor Alien 4 Cloud.

steps.title: Users configuration
steps.content: Click here to setup users, groups and their roles.

steps.title: Plugins configuration here...
steps.content: Click here to add/remove and setup plugins. Plugins are mandatory to setup clouds as you need at least one PaaS provider plugin.

steps.title: and also here...
steps.content: You can also use links on main administration page corresponding to the left menu buttons.

steps.title: Clouds configuration
steps.content: Click here to create a cloud associated to PaaS provider plugin added previously.

steps.title: Cloud images configuration
steps.content: Click here to configure images provided by your cloud in order to use it in application deployment step.

steps.title: Optional : meta-properties
steps.content: Meta-properties are additional data required by administrator and targeting application or component. Those properties are used for administration purpose.

steps.title: Monitoring : A4C metrics
steps.content: Technical informations about your running Alien 4 Cloud (memory, cpu,...)

steps.title: Monitoring : operations audit
steps.content: Configure and check informations about operations done (category, http request, author,...)
